column4: I would like to switch to the k7 kernel from the 386 becouse I can't get all my ram to work, will the nvidia driver work after this and if not what do I need to do?
when I try to open a .rar file I made in winace with archiver it says archive type not supported... The question is why, becouse I have installed rar
